short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RuseKronos is a student organiser/utility designed for JRAHS's students and teachers, notifying when to go to class or go to break.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 3 of RuseKronos Chrome Extension brings you all the new features of RuseKronos Version 3 Website. See after school and before school timetabled classes along with your normal classes in a new refreshing and clean UI design with millions of colour themes to choose from. To use the extension, upload your timetable through the physical webpage: https://dev.rusekronos.xyz/. To change colours and customise the look, use the settings tab on the physical webpage. To report bugs (as this is still in beta), please use this link: https://forms.gle/d93uiQsFzMpmcb5ZA

NOTE: This Extension is still in its beta, and it may be very buggy. Please see our disclaimer and consider caution before use.

Chrome Extension for RuseKronos is a quick way of accessing the time, or knowing when if the next period. Created for James Ruse Agricultural H. S. Students, the purpose is the to solve the problem of using unreliable and unfriendly user interfaces. RuseKronos is a way to simply things and deliver multiple utilities in a simple, modern look, all being very reliable. Brought to you by the Ruse Utilities Group. Email: ruseutilitiesgroup@gmail.com
